answerText: canonical partition function [prompt on Z][10] Another important value in thermodynamical systems is the chemical potential, which is the conjugate variable to this quantity. This quantity is 6.02 times 10 to the 23rd for a mole of gas.
heading: ACF Regionals |2015 | MIT A & Texas A&M A  | 1 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: In quantum mechanics, this quantity can be written as the trace over the state space, i.e. the exponential of the negative of the thermodynamic beta times the Hamiltonian. For 10 points each: [10] Name this quantity that is calculated by summing the Boltzmann factors for all of a system's microstates. The probability that the system occupies a given microstate is its Boltzmann factor divided by this quantity.
